thread.title_full: Excellent! Affordable! - Review of Hotel Roma Sacre Coeur, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Vanessa A
title: Excellent! Affordable!
text:
Great Budget hotel. Amazing location.10steps to the metro.Surroundings have great cafes, restaurants, supermarkets, shopping area.
Courteous, polite,helpful staff.
Not a king size breakfast,but fairly substantial.
Sweet/colourful rooms with fairly decent amenities like refrigerator and digital locker.comfy bed with clean sheets.
Quiet rooms,except the cop car siren at times can be very unnerving.
Awesome WiFi connection.
Clean Bathrooms,clean/average amenities with good clean hairdryer/towels.Bath tub needs to b installed with a shower curtain,as the water floods the bathroom,which makes it difficult to clean for housekeeping as well as dangerous as there is a chance of slipping.
Overall,enjoyed d stay.Comfortable/peaceful. definitely will recommend it and would love to stay here again.
